sql.statement: INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1821,183,'Aji godhong garing - Barang kang ora nduwe aji babar pisan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1822,183,'Ana catur mungkur - ora gelem ngrungokake rerasan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1823,183,'Ana dhaulate ora ono begjane - Wis arep nemu kebegjan nanging ora sido','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1824,183,'Ana gula ana semut - Panggonan sing ngrejekeni mesthi akeh sing nekani','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1825,183,'Anak polah bapa keprandhah - Wong tuwa nemu reribed amarga saka polahe anak','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1826,183,'Ancik-ancik pucuking eri - Wong kang tansah sumelang yen keluputan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1827,183,'Anggutuk lor kena kidul - Ngangkah marang sawijining wong katibakake marang wong liya','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1828,183,'Angon mangsa - Golek wektu sing prayoga','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1829,183,'Angon ulat ngumbar tangan - Nyawang kahanan arep nglimpe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1830,183,'Arep jamure emoh watange - Gelem kepenak ora gelem rekasane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1831,183,'Asu arebut balung - Padu rebutan barang sepele','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1832,183,'Asu gedhe menang kerahe - Wong sing gedhe pangkate mesthi luwih gedhe panguasane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1833,183,'Asu marani gepuk - Njarak marani bebaya','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1834,183,'Ati bengkong oleh oncong - Duwe niyat ala oleh dalan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1835,183,'Bala dewa ilang gapite - ilang kaluhurane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1836,183,'Banyu pinerang - Pasulayane sedulur mesthi enggal pulihe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1837,183,'Bathang lelaku - Wong lelungan ngambah panggonan sing mbebayani','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1838,183,'Bathok bolu isi madu - Wong asor nanging sugih kapinteran','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1839,183,'Bebek mungsuh mliwis - Wong pinter mungsuh wong pinter','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1840,183,'Becik ketitik ala ketara - Becik ala bakal ketara ing tembe mburi','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1841,183,'Belo melu seton - Mung melu-melu bae ora ngerti karepe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1842,183,'Beras wutah orang mulih marang takere - Samu barang kang wis owah arang bisa pulih kaya maune','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1843,183,'Mbidhung apirowang - Arep ngrewangi malah ngrusuhi','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1844,183,'Blaba wuda - Saking lomane nganti uripe kacingkrangan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1845,183,'Blilu tau pinter durung nglakoni - Senajan durung mangerti nanging wis bisa nglakoni','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1846,183,'Bubuk oleh leng - Duwe niyat ala oleh dalan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1847,183,'Buru uceng kelangan dheleg - Mburu barang sepele kelangan barang sing aji','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1848,183,'Busuk ketekuk pinter keblinger - Bodho lan pinter padha dene nemoni cilaka','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1849,183,'Mbuwang tilas - Nutupi patrapane ethok-ethok nyambut gawe liya','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1850,183,'Bung pring petung - Bocah sing gelis gedhe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1851,183,'Buntel kadhut ora nginang ora udud - Wong nyambut gawe borongan, oraoleh mangan lan rokok','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1852,183,'Car-cor kaya kurang janganan - Guneman waton metu tanpa dipikir dhisik','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1853,183,'Cathok gawel - Ora diajak rembugan nanging melu-melu ngrembug','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1854,183,'Cebol nggayuh lintang - Duwe kekarepan sing mokal bakal kelakon','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1855,183,'Cecak nguntal empyak - Gegayuhan sing ora timbang karo kekuwatane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1856,183,'Cedhak celelng boloten (Cedhak kebo gupak) - Cedhak karo wong ala ngajari katut ala','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1857,183,'Cincing-cincing meksa klebus - Rekane arep ngirit nanging meksa entek akeh','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1858,183,'Ciri wanci lelai ginawa mati - Pakulitanan ilange menawa wis mati','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1859,183,'Criwis cawis - Akeh alesan nanging gelem nindakake','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1860,183,'Cuplak andheng-andheng ora prenah panggonanebakal disingkirake - Samubarang kang njalari ala prayogane disingkirake','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1861,183,'Dadia suket suthik nyengggut - Emoh sapa aruh','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1862,183,'Dahwen ati open - Nacad sejatine melik','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1863,183,'Dhadhang diunekake kuntul, kuntul diunekake dhadhang - Ala diunekake apik, apik diunekake ala','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1864,183,'Desa mawa cara, negara mawa tata - Saben panggonan duwe cara dhewe-dhewe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1865,183,'Dhemit ora ndulit setan ora doyan - Tansah ginajar slamet, ora ana reribed','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1866,183,'Digarokake diulokake - Dikon nyambut gawe abot','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1867,183,'Dikena iwake aja nganti buthek banyune - Bisa kaleksanan karepe tanpa gawe gendra','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1868,183,'Dipalangana mlumpat, ditalenana medhot - Ora kena dipenggak','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1869,183,'Diwenehi ati ngrogoh rempela - Diwenehi sethithik njaluk sing akeh','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1870,183,'Dom sumurup ing banyu - Laku samar','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1871,183,'Dudu berase ditempurake - Nyambungi guneme liyan nanging ora gathuk','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1872,183,'Dudu sanak dudu kadang, yen mati melu kelingan - Senajan wong liya, yen ana rekasane melu ngrasakake','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1873,183,'Dudutan lan anculan - Padha kethikan, sing siji api-apai ora ngerti','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1874,183,'Durung ilang puput lempuyange - Dipadhake bocah cilik, durun dianggep diwasa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1875,183,'Eman-eman ora keduman - Rekane welas nanging rugi','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1876,183,'Emban cidhe emban siladan - Siji lan sijine ora padha pangrekuhe (ora adil)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1877,183,'Embat-embat clarat - Nyambut gawe sing ngati-ati banget','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1878,183,'Emprit abuntut bedhug - Prakara sepele dadi gedhe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1879,183,'Endhas gundhut dikepeti - Wis kepenak ditambahi luwih kepenak maneh','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1880,183,'Enggon welud didoli udhet - Panggonane wong pinter, dipameri kepinteran','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1881,183,'Entek golek kurang amek - Olehe ngunen-uneni sakatoge','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1882,183,'Entek jarake - Entek kasugihane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1883,183,'Esuk dhele sore tempe - Ora teteg atine (mencla-mencle)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1884,183,'Gagak nganggo laring merak - Wong asor duwe tumindak kaya wong luhur','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1885,183,'Gajah alingan suket teki - Lair karo batine beda banget, mesthi bakal ketara','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1886,183,'Nggajah elar - Sarwa gedhe lan santosa kekarepane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1887,183,'Gajah ngidak rapah - Wong sing nrajang wewalere dhewe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1888,183,'Gajah tumbuk, kancil mati tengah - Wong gedhe padha padudon, wong cilik sing sengsara','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1889,183,'Garang garing - Umuk sugih nanging sejatine kacingkrangan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1890,183,'Gawe luwangan, ngurugi luwangan - Golek utang kanggo nyaur utang','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1891,183,'Nggayuh-nggayuh luput - Samubarang sing dijangka ora kaleksanan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1892,183,'Genthong umos - Ora bisa nyimpen wadi','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1893,183,'Giri lusi tan kena ingina - Ora kena ngina marang wong liya','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1894,183,'Gliyak-gliyuk tumindake sareh pakoleh - Alon-alon olehe tumindak, nanging kaleksanan sedyane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1895,183,'Golek banyu bening - Golek pitutur sing becik','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1896,183,'Golek-golek ketanggor wong luru-luru - Karepe arep golek-golek malah dijaluki','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1897,183,'Golek uceng kelangan dheleg - Golek sethithik malah kelangan akeh','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1898,183,'Gong lumaku tinabuh - Wong kang kumudu-kudu ditakoni','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1899,183,'Gumembrang ora adang - Entek-entekan, wis ora ana babar pisan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1900,183,'Gupak pulut ora mangan nangkane - Melu rekasane ora melu kepenake','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1901,183,'Idu didilat maneh - Njabel gunem sing wis kawetu','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1902,183,'Iwak klebu ing wuwu - Kena apus sarana gampang banget','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1903,183,'Njagakake barang sing durung mesthi - Njagakake barang sing durung mesthi','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1904,183,'Njajah desa milang kori - Lelungan menyang ngendi-endi','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1905,183,'Jalma angkara mati murka - Nemu bilahi jalaran saka murka','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1906,183,'Jalukan ora wewehan - Seneng njaluk nanging ora gelem weweh','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1907,183,'Jaran krubuhan empyak - Wong sing wis kapok banget','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1908,183,'Jarit luwas ing sampiran - Wong duwe kapinteran nanging ora dugunakake','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1909,183,'Jati ketlusuban ruyung - Golongane wong becik kalebon wong ala','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1910,183,'Jer basuki mawa beya - Kabeh gegayuhan mbutuhake wragad','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1911,183,'Njujul wuwul - Prakara sing ngundhak-undhaki rekasa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1912,183,'Njunjung ngentebake - Ngalembana nangning niyate ngasorake','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1913,183,'Kacang mangsa ninggala lanjaran - Kelakuwane anak akeh-akehe niru wong tuwane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1914,183,'Kadang konang - Ngakoni sudulur mung karo sing sugih-sugih','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1915,183,'Kakehan gludhug kurang udan - Kakehan omong nanging ora ana buktine','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1916,183,'kalah cacak menang cacak - Embuh kalah embuh menang wani nyoba','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1917,183,'Kandhang langit kemul mega - Wong sing ora duwe papan panggonan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1918,183,'Karubyung kabotan pinjung sarwa - Wong wadon iku anane ribed','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1919,183,'Katepang ngrangsang gunung - Kagedhen panjangka mokal bakal kelakon','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1920,183,'Katon cempaka sewakul - Disenengi wong akeh','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1921,183,'Kaya banyu karo lenga - Paseduluran sing ora bisa rukun','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1922,183,'Kaya dhayang oleh kedhung - Nglakoni gaweyan sing cocok karo atine','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1923,183,'Kaya wedhus dhumbar ing kacangan - Kesenangan amarga nemoni apa sing dibutuhake','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1924,183,'Kebat kliwat gancang pincang - Yen tumindak sarwa kesusu asile ora becik','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1925,183,'Kebanjiran segara madu - Nemoni kabegjan sing gedhe banget','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1926,183,'Kebo ilang tombok kandhang - Wis kelangan isih tombok maneh','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1927,183,'Kebo bule mati setra - Wong pinter nanging ora ana sing mbutuhake','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1928,183,'Kebo kabotan sungu - Wong tuwa sing rekasa amarga kakehan anak','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1929,183,'Kebo lumumpat ing palang - Ngadili prekara orang nganggo wewaton','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1930,183,'Kebo mulih menyang kandhang - Wong lunga bali maneh menyang asale','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1931,183,'Kebo nungsu gudel - Wong tuwa njaluk wuruk marang wong enom','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1932,183,'Kagedhen empyak kurang cagak - Kagedhen kekarepan nanging ora sembada','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1933,183,'Kejrugugan gunung menyan - nemu kabegjan gedhe banget','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1934,183,'Kekudhung walulang macan - Ngapusi wong saran njaluk tulung marang wong sing dipercaya dening wong sing diapusi','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1935,183,'Kelacak kepathak - Wis ora bisa selak amarga kabukten','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1936,183,'Kemladheyan ngajak sempal - Wong manut marake rusak','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1937,183,'Kena iwake aja buthek banyune - Bisa kelakon kekarepane nanging ora gawe rame','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1938,183,'Kendel ngringkel dhadhang ora godag - Ngakune kendel lan pinter jebule jirih tur bodho','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1939,183,'Kencana katon wingka - Senajan apik tetep ora seneng','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1940,183,'Kenes ora ethes - Sugih nanging bodho','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1941,183,'Keplok ora tombok - Melu seneng nanging ora wragad','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1942,183,'Kere munggah bale - Wong asor diadekake wong mulya','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1943,183,'Kere nemoni malem - Wong kang bedhigasan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1944,183,'Kerot ora duwe untu - Duwe kekarepan nanging ora duwe wragad','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1945,183,'Karubuhan gunung - Nemoni kasusahan sing gedhe banget','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1946,183,'Kesandhung ing rata, kebentus ing tawang - Nemu bebaya sing ora dinyana-nyana','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1947,183,'Ketepang ngrangsang gunung - Njangka prakara sing mokal kelakone','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1948,183,'Ketiban awu anget - Ora ngerti apa-apa didakwa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1949,183,'Ketula-tula ketali - Tansah nandhang rekasa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1950,183,'Kethek saranggon - Wong ala sagrombolan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1951,183,'Klenthing wadhah masin - Wong sing kulina laku ala, senajan simareni kala mangsane isih nglakoni ala','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1952,183,'Kleyang kabur kanginan - Wong urip sing kalunta-lunta','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1953,183,'Kongsi jambul uwanan - Nganti tuwa banget','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1954,183,'Krokot ing galeng - Wong sing mlarat banget','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1955,183,'Kriwikan dadi gedhe - Prakara cilik dadi gedhe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1956,183,'Kumenthus ora pecus - Doyan umuk nanging ora sembada','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1957,183,'Kuncung nganti gelung - Suwe banget ora netepi janji','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1958,183,'Kurung munggah lumbung - Batur dipek bojo bendarane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1959,183,'Kutuk nggendhong kemiri - Nyandhang sarwa aji ngliwati papn sing gawat','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1960,183,'Kutuk marani sunduk - Njarak marang bebaya','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1961,183,'Ladak kecangklak - Wong angkuh nemahi cilaka amarga polahe dhewe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1962,183,'Lahang koroban manis - Rupa bagus (ayu) tur kuhur bebudene','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1963,183,'Lambe satumang kari samerang - Aweh pitutur nola-bali ora digape','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1964,183,'Lanang kemangi - Wong lanang sing jirih','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1965,183,'Legan golek momongan - Wong sing kepenak golek rekasa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1966,183,'Lumpuh ngideri jagad - Duwe kekarepan sing mokal kelakone','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1967,183,'Madu balung tanpa isi - Padudon amarga barang sepele','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1968,183,'Maju tatu mundur ajur - Kabeh budidayane ora kasil','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1969,183,'Matang tuna numbak luput - Tansah luput kekarepane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1970,183,'Meneng widara uleran - Wong sing laire katon anteng nanging ala atine','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1971,183,'Menthung koja kena sembagine - Karepe ngapusi malah kapusan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1972,183,'Merangi tatal - Mentahake rembug sing wis dadi','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1973,183,'Mikul dhuwur mendhem jero - njunjung drajade wong tuwa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1974,183,'Milih-milih tebu oleh boleng - Amarga kakehan pilihan wusanane oleh sing ala','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1975,183,'Mrojol selaning garu - kalis ing sambekala','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1976,183,'Mubra-mrubu blabur madu - Sarwa kecukupan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1977,183,'Nabok nyilih tangan - Nindakake tumindak ala sarana kongkonan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1978,183,'Nambong laku - Ethok-ethok ora ngerti','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1979,183,'Nucuk ngiberake - Disuguh mulihe mbrekat','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1980,183,'Nututi layangan pedhot - Ngupaya barang sepele sing wis ilang','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1981,183,'Ngagar metu kawul - Ngojok-ojok supaya dadi pasulayan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1982,183,'Ngalasake negara - Ora manut pranatan negara','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1983,183,'Ngalem legining gula - Nyebut kaluwihing wong liya','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1984,183,'Ngaturake kidang lumayu - Nuduhake gegayuhan sing angel kecekel','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1985,183,'Ngemut legining gula - Bareng karasa kepenak lali marang asale','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1986,183,'Ngenteni timbule watu item - Ngenteni barang sing tangeh kelakon','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1987,183,'Ngungguhi klasa gumelar - nemu kepanake tanpa melu rekasane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1988,183,'Ngontragage gunung - Wong asor bisa ngalahake wong luhur','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1989,183,'Nguthik-uthik macan dhedhe - Gawe nesune wong','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1990,183,'Nguyahi segara - Tandang gawe sing muspra','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1991,183,'Nyangoni kawula minggat - Ndandani barang sing pijer rusak','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1992,183,'Nyolong pethek - Ora dinyana-nyana','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1993,183,'Nyunggi lumpang kentheng - Munggah drjade nanging ora ana pametuhe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1994,183,'Obah ngarep kobet mburi - Solah bawane wong gedhe dadi panutane wong cilik','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1995,183,'Opor bebek mentas awak dhewek - Mentas saka rekadayane dhewe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1996,183,'Onthak-athik didudut angel - Rembuge sajake kepenak bareng ditenani jebul angel','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1997,183,'Ora ana banyu mili mendhuwur - Watake anak mesthi niru wong tuwane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1998,183,'Ora ana kukus tanpa geni - Ora ana sebab tanpa musabab','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(1999,183,'Ora ana ganja ora unus - Ala samubarange','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2000,183,'Ora ngerti kenthang kimpule - ora ngerti jalarane prekasa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2001,183,'Ora mambu enthong irus - Dudu sanak dudu kadang','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2002,183,'Ora tembung ora lawang - Njupuk barang tanpa nembung dhisik','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2003,183,'Ora uwur ora sembur - Ora gelem cawe-cawe sethithika bae','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2004,183,'Pager mangan tanduran - Dipercaya malah ngrusak','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2005,183,'Pandegan karo srengenge - Mungsuh karo wong kuwasa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2006,183,'Pandhitaning antake - Laire suci, nanging bathine reged','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2007,183,'Pitik trondhol diumbar ing pandaringan - Wong ala dipasrahi tunggu barang aji','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2008,183,'Petruk tunggu bara - Dipasrahi sing dadi kesenengane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2009,183,'Pupur sawise benjut - Ngati-ati sawise kebacut kelakon','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2010,183,'Rampek-rampek kethek - Nyedhak-nyedhak mung arep gawe katitunan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2011,183,'Rawe-rawe rantas malang-malang putung - Kabeh sing ngalang-ngalangi disingkirake','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2012,183,'Rebut balung tanpaisi, rebut kemiri kopong - Padudon rebutan barang sepele','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2013,183,'Rindhik asu digitik - Dikongkon nglakoni gaweyan sing cocok karo kekarepane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2014,183,'Rukun agawe santosa, crah agawe bubrah - Kerukunan ndadekake sentosa, congkrah ndadekake karusakan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2015,183,'Sabaya pati sabaya mukti - Rukun nganti tekan pati','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2016,183,'Sadumuk bathuk sanyari bumi - Nglabuhi pati marang bebener','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2017,183,'Sapa salah saleh - Sapa sing salah bakal kalah','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2018,183,'Satru munggwing cangklakan - mungsuh kang isih sedulur','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2019,183,'Sedhakep ngawe-ngawe - Mareni tumnidak ala, nanging isih kepingin tumindak maneh','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2020,183,'Sembur-sembur adas, siram-siram bayem - Bisa kalesanan marga dongane wong akeh','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2021,183,'Sepi ing pamrih rame ing gawe - Tumandang gawe tanpa duwe melik','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2022,183,'Sluman slumun slamet - Tandang tanduke tansah ngati-ngati','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2023,183,'sumur lumaku tinimba - nawak-nawakake ilmu supa diangsu','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2024,183,'Tebu tuwuh socane - Prekara sing wis becik dadi bubrah marga dirusuhi','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2025,183,'Tekek mati ing ulone - nemahi cilaka amarga saka guneme dhewe','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2026,183,'Tembang rawat-rawat, ujare bakul sinambewara - Kabar sing durung mesthi bener lupute','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2027,183,'Thenguk-thenguk akeklumpuk - Wis kepenak tambah kepenak maneh','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2028,183,'Trenggiling api mati - Sejatine ngrungokake nanging ethok-ethok ora merduli','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2029,183,'Timun jinara - Samubarang sing gampang banget','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2030,183,'Timun mungsuh duren - WOng ringkih mungsuh wong kuwat','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2031,183,'Timun wungkuk jaga imbuh - Mung kanggo jagan yen ana kurangane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2032,183,'Tinggal glanggang colong playu - keplayu saka tanggung jawab','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2033,183,'Tulung menthung - katone nulung nanging marahi susah','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2034,183,'Tumbak cucukan - Seneng adul-adul','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2035,183,'Tumbu oleh tutup - Wong kekancan sing cocok banget','','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2037,183,'Tunggak jarak nrjak, tunggak jati mati - Turune wong cilik dadi wong gedhe, turune wong gedhe dadi wong cilik','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2038,183,'Tunggal banyu - Tunggal ngelmu, tunggal guru','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2039,183,'Tunggal welat - Sedulur sinarawedi','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2040,183,'Tutwuri handayani - Menehi kelonggaran lan ugo menhi pepeling amrih becik','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2041,183,'Ula marani gepuk - Njarak marang bebaya','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2042,183,'Ulat madhep ati karep - Wis mantep banget','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2043,183,'Undhaking pawarta sudaning kiriman - Pawarta iku lumrahe wis beda karo nyatane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2045,183,'Ungak-ungak pager arang - Ngisin-ngisine pokal gawene','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2046,183,'Welas tanpa lalis - Aweh rasa welas nanging njalari rekasane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2047,183,'Wis kebak sundukane - Wong sing akeh banget kaluputane','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2048,183,'Wiwit kuncung nganti gelung - Wiwit cilik nganti tuwa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2049,183,'Yitna yuwana lena kena - Sing ngati-ati slamet, sing sembrana bakal cilaka','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2050,183,'Yuyu rumpung mbarong ronge - Omahe katon njenggarong nanging mlarat','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2051,183,'Yiydan mungging rampadan - Maune durjana dadi wong alin','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2052,183,'Yoga anyangga yogi - Murid nirokake piwulangan gurune','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2053,183,'Yuwanta mati lena - Wong becik nemoni cilaka amarga kurang ngati-ati','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2054,184,'Pak boletus : tepak kebo lelene satus','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2055,184,'Burnas kopen : bubur panas kokopen','','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2058,184,'Pak lawa : tepak ula dawa','','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2060,184,'Surles pe dheg wer-weran : susurledipe nang gedheg jewer-jeweran','','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2062,185,'Sega sakepel dirubung tinggi, (salak)','Salak','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2063,185,'Ora mudhun-mudhun yen ora nggawa mrica sakanthong, (kates)','Pepaya','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2071,185,'Wis gedhe kok ngguyu tawa, (nangis)','Menangis','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2074,186,'Pucung ************************ Bapak pucung renteng-renteng kaya kalung, dawa kaya ula. pencokanmu wesi miring sing disaba si pucung mung turut kutha. (sepur)','Kereta Api','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2075,186,'Bapak pucung dudu watu dudu gunung. Sangkamu ing Plembang ngon ingone sang Bupati yen lumampah si pucung lembehan grana. (gajah)','Gajah','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2076,187,'Njanur gunung, kadingaren dolan mrene (janur gunung : aren)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2077,187,'Ngrokok cendhak, bocah cilik ora kena neges-neges (rokok cendhak : tegesan)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2078,187,'Njenang gula lho, aja lali (jenang gula : glali)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2079,187,'Nggodhong garing, esuk-esuk kok wis nglaras (godhong garing : klaras','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2080,187,'Balung klapa, ethok-ethok ora ngerti (balung klapa : bathok)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2081,187,'Balung geni, mbok menawa aku ora bisa teka (balung geni : mawa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2082,187,'Balung janur, sida lunga apa ora (balung janur : sada)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2083,187,'Balung pakel, aja seneng alok-alok! (balung pakel : pelok)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2084,187,'Balung klapa, ethok-ethokan wae (balung klapa : bathok)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2085,187,'Balung jagung, punika sampun dados tanggel jawab kula (balung jagung : janggel)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2086,187,'Nyaron bumbung, nganti cengklungan olehku ngenteni (saron bumbung : angklung)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2087,187,'Jangan gori, nganti judheg anggonku mikir (jangan gori : gudheg)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2088,187,'Kendhil dawa, enggal ditandangi. (kendhil dawa : dandang)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2089,187,'Mutra bebek, kawit mau mung wira-wiri wae. (putra bebek : meri)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2090,187,'Mrica kecut, yen mung muni pancen gampang (mrica kecut : wuni)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2091,187,'Sarung jagung, abot entheng taklakoni. (sarung jagung : klobot)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2092,187,'Bocah kok menthil kacang, tansah mbesengut. (pentil kacang : besengut)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2093,187,'Sekar aren, sampun dangu-dangu. (sekar aren : dangu)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2094,187,'Reca kayu, goleka kawruh rahayu. (reca kayu : golekan)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2095,187,'Roning mlinjo, sampun sayah nyuwun ngaso. (roning mlinjo : so)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2096,187,'Wohing tanjung, becik njunjung bapa biyung. (woh tanjung : kecik)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2097,187,'Kapi jarwa, dkpethek mangsa wurunga. (kapi jarwa : kethek)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2098,187,'Kukus gantung, dak sawang kok sajake bingung. (kukus gantung : sawang)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2099,187,'Kembang jambu, kemaruk duwe sepedha anyar. (kembang jambu : karuk)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2100,188,'Ancur kaca, kaca kocak munggwing netra. Wong wruh rasa, tan mamak ing tata krama (ancur kaca: rasa, kaca kocak munggwing netra : tesmak)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2101,188,'Carang wreksa, wreksa wilis tanpa patra. Ora gampang wong urip ing alam donya. (cacang wreksa : pang) (wreksa wilis tanpa patra : wit kayu urip)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2102,188,'Kolik priya, wanara Anjani putra. tuhu eman, wong anom wedi kangelan. (kolik priya : tuhu, wanara Anjani putra : anoman)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2103,188,'Yaksa dewa, dewa dewi lir danawa. Kala mudha, bangkit ambengkas durmaga. (yeksa dewa : Bethara Kala) (Dewa dewi lir danawa : Bethari Durga)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2104,188,'Roning kamal, putrane Pandhita Durna. Mumpung enom, ngudi laku utama. (ron kamal : sinom, putrane Pandhita Durna : Aswatama)','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2105,188,'Witing kalapa jawata ing ngarcapada. Salagune, wong sinau aja sembrana. (wit klapa : glugu, jawata ing ngarcapada : wong)','','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2106,189,'Kinanthi ******************************************** Kinanthi lingging pitutur, kenthang rambat menyan putih, awasna dipun pratela. noleha wiranging wuri, cecongkak wohing kalapa, kang dadi pathoking uri - Kenthang rambat : telo - menyan puting : wlirang - cecongkak wohing klapa : bathok','Bermaksud : Ketela, Wlirang, Batok kelapa','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2107,190,'Pangkur ******************************************** Singgang gung kang piniyara, mardi siswa kakawinireng estri, wineh winulangaken wadu, Peputhut mong Pregiwa, kang sumewa pasewakaning kalangun, pangrantamireng pradangga, sesendhohan genti-genti.
- singagang gung kang piniyara : winih - mardi siswa : mulang - kakawinireng estri : wadu - peputhut pregiwa : janaloka - pangrantamireng pradangga : sendhon','Bermaksud : Benih, Mengajar, Wadu, Janaloka','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2108,191,'TEMBANG --o00o-- Tembang Jawa ana telung warna: 1. Tembang Macapat, 2. Tembang Tengahan, 3. Tembang Gedhe. ---------------------------------------------
1. Tembang Macapat ana II pupuh: 1. Asmaradana 7. megatruh 2. Dhandhang gula 8. Mijil 3. Durma 9. Pangkur 4. Gambuh 10. Pucung 5. Kinanthi 11. Sinom 6. Maskumambang
2. Tembang Tengahan: 1. Balabak 3. Jurudemung 2. Girisa 4. Wirangrong
3. Tembang Gedhe: 1. Citramengeng 3. Mintajiwa 2. Kusumastuti 4. Pamularsih
---------------------------------------------
Ing tembang Jawa saben sak baris diarani sak gatra Dhandhang gula ana : 10 gatra ( baris) Gambuh ana : 5 gatra (baris Kinanthi ana : 6 gatra (baris) megatruh ana : 7 gatra (baris) Pangkur ana : 9 gatra (baris)
---------------------------------------------
Guru Wilangan lan Guru Lagu Guru Wilangan, yaiku : akehing kecap (ucap utawa suku tembung saben sa gatra (baris) Guru Lagu, Yaiku : aksara urip (vokal) ing pungkasaning gatra (baris)','','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2109,1892,'KINANTHI Kinanthi | Guru wilangan | Guru lagu --------------------------------------------- Anoman malumpat sampun = 8 wanda = u Prapteng witing nagasari = 8 wanda = i Mulat mangandhap katingal = 8 wanda = a Wanodya yu kuru aking = 8 wanda = i Gelung rusak wor lan kisma = 8 wanda = a Kang iga-iga kaeksi = 8 wanda = i','','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2110,193,'PANGKUR -------------------------------------------- Mingkar-mingkuring ankara akarana karenan mardi siwi sinawung resmining kidung sinuba sinukarta mrih kertarta pakartining ngelmu luhung kang tumrap neng tanah Jawa agama ageming aji. (Wedhatama. KGPAA Mangkunegara IV)','','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2111,194,'DHANDHANG GULA -------------------------------------------- Dhuh kusuma ingkang milangoni, buron arum ingkang sobeng wana, yen panggih sun arasane, sumber gung ngisor gunung, wreksa langking sisaning agni, sun sandhang pinarenga nedya amemanuh, wit saking tresnaning manah, surya ratri wong kuning sun kawulani, sun adhep saben dina.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2112,195,'Abang-abang gendera landa, ana sing ijo kok milih putih. Bujang maneh ora ngluyura, sing wis duwe bojo ora tau mulih.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2113,195,'Ana brambang saen lima. Berjuang labuh negara.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2114,195,'Bisa ngendhang ora bisa bisa nyuling. Bisa nyawang ora wani nyandhing.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2115,195,'Bibi surip tuku klobot, pethuk encik tawa roti. Uwong urip pancen abot, mula becik ngati-ngati.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2116,195,'Esuk nakir sore nakir, sing ditakir godhong plasa. Esok mikir sore mikir, sing dipikir ora rumangsa.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2117,195,'Gudheg manggar, bumbune mrica ketumbar. Lamun sabar, bisa lejar sarta bingar.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2118,195,'Jambu apa jeruk. Aku melu apa entuk','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2119,195,'Jemek-jemek gula jawa. Aja sok ngenyek karo kanca.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2120,195,'Jangan kacang jangan kara, kaduk uyah kurang gula. Welingku marang para mudha, aja wedi ing rekasa.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2121,195,'Kembang mlathi, warna peni ngganda wangi. Watak putri, kudu setiti angati-anti.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2122,195,'Kembang menur tinandur ing pinggir sumur. Yen wis makmur aja lali marang sedulur.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2123,195,'Kutha kendhal kali wungu. Ajar kenal karo aku.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2124,195,'Kembang aren sumebar pinggir kalen. Aja dhawen yen kowe kepingin kajen.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2125,195,'Kembang kencur, ganda sedhep sandhing sumur. Kudu jujur, yen kowe kepingin makmur.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2126,195,'Kembang mawar, ganda arum ngambar-ngambar. Ati bingar ajamung yen nampa bayar.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2127,195,'Kembange kembang cempaka, dudu kembang arum dalu. Mumpung sira isih mudha, kudu sregep ngundi ngelmu.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2128,195,'Manuk emprit mucuk pari. Dadi murid sing taberi.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2129,195,'Manuk tuhu mencok pager. Yen sinau mesthi pinter.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2130,195,'Ngasah arit nganti landhep. Dadi murid kudu sregep.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2131,195,'Rujak cengkir, pantese diwadhahi cangkir. Mlipar-mlipir, polahe wong lagi naksir.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2132,195,'Semarang kaline banjir. Ja sumelang ra dipikir.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2133,195,'Tawon madu ngisep sari kembang jambu. Aja nesu yen tinuding kaluputanmu.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2134,195,'Tawon madu ngisep sekar. Dadi guru kudu sabar.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2135,195,'Wajik klethik gula jawa. Luwih becik sing prasaja.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2136,195,'Wedang bubuk gula tebu. Mata ngantuk njaluk turu.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2137,195,'Korek gambar klenthing. Kula ndherek wonten wingking.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2138,195,'Wong yen lagi gandrung. Ra perduli mbledose gunung.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2139,195,'Wong yen lagi naksir. Ra perduli sing ditaksir kenthir.','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2140,196,'1. Aja dumeh menang banjur tumindak sewenang-wenang','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2141,196,'2. Ana awan, ana pangan','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2142,196,'3. Ana dina, ana upa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2143,196,'4. Ati karep, bandha cupet','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2144,196,'5. Bareg wis makmur, lali marnag sedulur','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2145,196,'6. Becik ketitik, ala ketara','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2146,196,'7. Gelem obah, mesti mamah','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2147,196,'8. Inggah inggih nanging ora kepanggih','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2148,196,'9. Ijo-ijo godhonge kara, bareng bodho lagi rumangsa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2149,196,'10. Ireng-ireng ketok untune, bareng seneng ketok guyune','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2150,196,'11. Kudu sregep sinau, sapa sing kepingin maju','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2151,196,'12. Ora cepet, ora ngliwet','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2152,196,'13. Ora ngedan, ora keduman','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2153,196,'14. Thengak-thenguk, nemu kethuk','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2154,196,'15. Tuwas sayah, ora paedah','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2155,196,'16. Wong bungah sok nemu susah','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2156,196,'17. Welingng guru, wong iku kudu mituhu marang bapa ibu, supaya slamet sing tinemu.','','')

INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2175,198,'Bayem arda, ardane ngrasuk busana','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2176,198,'Lungguh dhingklik, dhingklike wong cilik-cilik','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2177,198,'mangan ati, atine sing kelara-lara','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2178,198,'Nandhang lara, Larane wong lara lapa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2179,198,'Pandhu suta, suta madyaning Pandhawa','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2180,198,'Raja putra, putra daleme Ngastina','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2181,198,'Rujak degan, degane krambil ijo','','')
INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2182,198,'Remuk rempu, rempu dadi awu','','')
